type.description:
### ⚠️ Requires [Apugli](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) to be installed! ⚠️

## Instant Effect Immunity

---



[Power Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/instant_effect_immunity).

Prevents instant status effects from being applied to the entity that has the power from direct sources.

Type ID: `apugli:instant_effect_immunity`



---
type.markdownDescription:
### ⚠️ Requires [Apugli](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) to be installed! ⚠️

## Instant Effect Immunity

---



[Power Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/instant_effect_immunity).

Prevents instant status effects from being applied to the entity that has the power from direct sources.

Type ID: `apugli:instant_effect_immunity`



---

effect.description: If specified, only the instant status effect with this namespace and ID can not be applied to the entity that has the power.
effect.markdownDescription: If specified, only the instant status effect with this namespace and ID can not be applied to the entity that has the power.

effects.description: If specified, only the instant status effects with the specified namespace and IDs can not be applied to the entity that has the power.
effects.markdownDescription: If specified, only the instant status effects with the specified namespace and IDs can not be applied to the entity that has the power.

inverted.description: Determines whether to make the entity immune to the status effect(s) that aren't specified.
inverted.markdownDescription: Determines whether to make the entity immune to the status effect(s) that aren't specified.
